select
FROM llm_creative_content pic INNER JOIN llm_creative_content text on pic.business_uid = text.business_uid WHERE pic.type = 'picture' and text.type = 'copy_writing' and pic.business_uid = #{businessUid} and text.business_uid = #{businessUid}

select plan_uid AS planUid, business_uid AS businessUid, conversation_uid AS conversationUid, temp_uid AS copyWritingUid, temp_uid AS pictureTempUid, use_picture AS usePicture, execute_params AS pictureParams, execute_params AS copyWritingParams, status AS pictureStatus, status AS copyWritingStatus, start_time AS pictureStartTime, end_time AS pictureEndTime, execute_time AS pictureExecuteTime, start_time AS copyWritingStartTime, end_time AS copyWritingEndTime, execute_time AS copyWritingExecuteTime, copy_writing_title AS copyWritingTitle, copy_writing_content AS copyWritingContent, picture_num AS pictureNum, picture_content AS pictureContent, error_msg AS pictureErrorMsg, error_msg AS copyWritingErrorMsg, retry_count AS pictureRetryCount, retry_count AS copyWritingRetryCount, copy_writing_count AS copyWritingCount, extend AS pictureExtend, extend AS copyWritingExtend, claim AS claim, liked AS liked, tags AS tags FROM llm_creative_content WHERE type = 'all' and business_uid = #{businessUid}
